Uses of Class
org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.core.LoginConfiguration

  • Packages that use LoginConfiguration 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn
    This package contains classes for the RESTful Authentication endpoint.
    org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.authn.core
    This package contains core classes and methods for starting and continuing the authentication process.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LoginConfiguration LoginConfiguration.forceAuth​(String forceAuthReqParam)
      Sets the request's ForceAuth parameter.
      LoginConfiguration LoginProcess.getLoginConfiguration()
      Returns the LoginConfiguration object used to configure the login process.
      LoginConfiguration LoginConfiguration.httpRequest​(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpRequest)
      Sets the HttpServletRequest which initiated/continued the login process.
      LoginConfiguration LoginConfiguration.httpResponse​(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse httpResponse)
      Sets the HttpServletResponse which initiated/continued the login process.
      LoginConfiguration LoginConfiguration.indexType​(AuthIndexType indexType)
      Sets the Authentication Index Type to use in the login process.
      LoginConfiguration LoginConfiguration.indexValue​(String indexValue)
      Sets the Authentication Index value to use in the login process.
      LoginConfiguration LoginConfiguration.sessionId​(String sessionId)
      Sets the session id of the current login process.
      LoginConfiguration LoginConfiguration.sessionUpgrade​(String ssoTokenId)
      Sets the user's current session SSO Token Id to use in session upgrade.
